home.text: Here, we've handpicked a selection of mesmerizing short dramas, each one an emotionally wondrous journey. Whether you like romance, comedy, suspense or sci-fi, we have a short show you'll love.

list.name: Costume drama
list.text: In a distant ancient dynasty, power and love and hate intertwined, and the rise and fall of the dynasty coexisted with the enmity of the rivers and lakes. This is an era full of legendary colors, with heroes emerging and beauties like clouds.

list.name: Modern sweet pet
list.text: A warm and romantic modern sweet pet drama that tells the story of young men and women meeting and getting to know each other in the city, spending many beautiful times together, experiencing many sweet moments, and also facing the challenges and difficulties in life together, and falling in love.

list.name: Abusive love affair
list.text: A deeply emotional and gripping love drama. It tells the story of their love going through countless trials and tribulations, which have constantly devastated their relationship. However, even in the darkest moments, they still loved each other deeply. Their love is as hot as fire, but as desperate as the abyss, with love and hate intertwined and the helplessness of fate.

explore.name: Other Features
explore.text: Here you can see various types of short plays, there is always one that will touch your heart.
